1.name: Golden Achari Macaroni 250g
1.description: Experience the tangy and spicy flavors of Golden Achari Macaroni! This delicious macaroni is infused with traditional achari spices that bring the authentic taste of Pakistani pickles to your plate. Made with premium durum wheat and a perfect blend of aromatic spices, this macaroni offers a unique culinary experience that will tantalize your taste buds.
1.longDescription: Golden Achari Macaroni combines the comfort of pasta with the bold, tangy flavors of traditional Pakistani achari spices. Each bite delivers a perfect balance of sourness, spiciness, and aromatic herbs that make this dish truly special. Our premium macaroni is made from high-quality durum wheat, ensuring the perfect texture and taste in every serving. The carefully selected spice blend includes mustard seeds, fennel, fenugreek, and other traditional pickle spices that create an authentic and memorable dining experience. Perfect for family meals, quick lunches, or when you want to add some excitement to your regular pasta routine.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with included spice packet
Add vegetables and protein as desired
Serve hot and enjoy!

2.name: Golden Tikka Macaroni 250g
2.description: Savor the rich and smoky flavors of Golden Tikka Macaroni! This premium macaroni is seasoned with authentic tikka spices that bring the taste of traditional barbecue to your kitchen. Made with high-quality ingredients and a perfect blend of aromatic spices.
2.longDescription: Golden Tikka Macaroni brings the beloved flavors of tikka barbecue to your dining table in a convenient pasta form. Our expertly crafted spice blend captures the essence of traditional tikka marinades, featuring smoky paprika, aromatic cumin, and a hint of yogurt tanginess. Each strand of macaroni is designed to hold the rich flavors perfectly, ensuring every bite is packed with the authentic taste of tikka. Made from premium durum wheat and combined with carefully selected spices, this macaroni offers a restaurant-quality experience at home.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with included tikka spice packet
Add grilled chicken or vegetables
Garnish with fresh herbs and serve hot

3.name: Golden Creamy Alfredo Macaroni 250g
3.description: Indulge in the rich and creamy flavors of Golden Creamy Alfredo Macaroni! This luxurious macaroni features a velvety alfredo sauce blend that creates a restaurant-style dining experience at home.
3.longDescription: Golden Creamy Alfredo Macaroni delivers the ultimate comfort food experience with its rich, creamy sauce and perfectly cooked pasta. Our special alfredo blend combines the finest ingredients to create a smooth, velvety texture that coats every piece of macaroni beautifully. Made with premium durum wheat and enhanced with real cheese flavors, garlic, and herbs, this macaroni offers a sophisticated taste that appeals to both adults and children. The creamy sauce is perfectly balanced - not too heavy, yet rich enough to satisfy your cravings for something indulgent and delicious.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and reserve 1/2 cup pasta water
Mix with alfredo sauce packet and pasta water
Add butter or cream for extra richness
Serve immediately while hot

4.name: Golden Fajita Macaroni 250g
4.description: Enjoy the vibrant and zesty flavors of Golden Fajita Macaroni! This exciting fusion brings Mexican-inspired fajita spices to your favorite pasta, creating a unique and flavorful meal experience.
4.longDescription: Golden Fajita Macaroni combines the best of Mexican cuisine with Italian pasta traditions. Our carefully crafted fajita spice blend features bell peppers, onions, and authentic Mexican seasonings that create a colorful and flavorful dish. Each bite delivers the perfect balance of smoky, spicy, and savory flavors that make fajitas so beloved. Made with premium durum wheat pasta and a special blend of spices including cumin, chili powder, and lime, this macaroni brings the festive spirit of Mexican cuisine to your dinner table.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with fajita spice packet
Add saut√©ed bell peppers and onions
Garnish with fresh cilantro and lime

5.name: Golden 7 Spice Macaroni 250g
5.description: Discover the complex and aromatic flavors of Golden 7 Spice Macaroni! This unique blend combines seven carefully selected spices to create a multi-layered taste experience that's both exotic and comforting.
5.longDescription: Golden 7 Spice Macaroni features our signature blend of seven premium spices that create a symphony of flavors in every bite. This carefully balanced combination includes warm spices like cinnamon and allspice, aromatic herbs, and a touch of heat that builds gradually. Each spice is selected for its quality and ability to complement the others, resulting in a complex yet harmonious flavor profile. Made with premium durum wheat pasta, this macaroni offers a gourmet experience that's perfect for those who appreciate sophisticated flavors and culinary adventure.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with 7 spice packet gradually
Let flavors meld for 2-3 minutes
Serve hot with your favorite protein

6.name: Golden Hot & Sour Macaroni 250g
6.description: Experience the perfect balance of heat and tang with Golden Hot & Sour Macaroni! This exciting flavor combination delivers a thrilling taste adventure that awakens your senses with every bite.
6.longDescription: Golden Hot & Sour Macaroni brings together the best of both worlds - the fiery heat of carefully selected chilies and the tangy brightness of vinegar and citrus. This bold flavor combination creates an addictive taste that keeps you coming back for more. Our special blend includes traditional hot and sour ingredients like white pepper, vinegar powder, and chili flakes, balanced perfectly to create a harmonious yet exciting flavor profile. Made with premium durum wheat pasta, this macaroni is perfect for those who love bold, adventurous flavors.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with hot & sour spice packet
Add vegetables like cabbage and carrots
Adjust spice level to taste and serve hot

7.name: Golden Green Tikka Macaroni 250g
7.description: Enjoy the fresh and aromatic flavors of Golden Green Tikka Macaroni! This unique variant combines traditional tikka spices with fresh herbs and green chilies for a vibrant and flavorful experience.
7.longDescription: Golden Green Tikka Macaroni offers a fresh twist on the classic tikka flavor by incorporating vibrant green herbs and spices. This innovative blend features mint, cilantro, green chilies, and traditional tikka spices to create a refreshing yet robust flavor profile. The green herbs add a bright, fresh note that balances beautifully with the smoky tikka spices, creating a unique taste that's both familiar and exciting. Made with premium durum wheat pasta and natural herb extracts, this macaroni brings the essence of fresh herb marinades to your plate.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with green tikka spice packet
Add fresh herbs for extra flavor
Serve hot with yogurt on the side

8.name: Golden Chicken Karahi Macaroni 250g
8.description: Savor the authentic taste of Golden Chicken Karahi Macaroni! This delicious fusion brings the beloved flavors of traditional Pakistani chicken karahi to your favorite pasta, creating an unforgettable culinary experience.
8.longDescription: Golden Chicken Karahi Macaroni captures the essence of Pakistan's most beloved dish in a convenient pasta form. Our expertly crafted spice blend includes all the traditional karahi ingredients - tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and aromatic spices that create the signature tangy and spicy flavor profile. Each bite delivers the authentic taste of chicken karahi with its perfect balance of heat, tanginess, and rich spices. Made with premium durum wheat pasta and a carefully balanced spice mix, this macaroni brings the comfort of home-cooked Pakistani cuisine to your table.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with chicken karahi spice packet
Add cooked chicken pieces
Garnish with fresh ginger and green chilies

9.name: Golden BBQ Macaroni 250g
9.description: Indulge in the smoky and savory flavors of Golden BBQ Macaroni! This delicious variant brings the taste of outdoor barbecue to your kitchen with its rich, smoky spice blend.
9.longDescription: Golden BBQ Macaroni delivers the authentic taste of barbecue in every bite. Our special BBQ spice blend combines smoky paprika, brown sugar, and traditional barbecue seasonings to create that perfect balance of sweet, smoky, and savory flavors. Each strand of macaroni is designed to hold these rich flavors, ensuring every bite is packed with that distinctive barbecue taste. Made with premium durum wheat and enhanced with natural smoke flavoring, this macaroni brings the outdoor grilling experience indoors, perfect for any season.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with BBQ spice packet
Add grilled vegetables or meat
Serve hot with coleslaw on the side

10.name: Golden Achari Qeema Macaroni 250g
10.description: Experience the ultimate fusion with Golden Achari Qeema Macaroni! This innovative blend combines the tangy achari spices with the rich flavors of traditional qeema, creating a unique and satisfying meal.
10.longDescription: Golden Achari Qeema Macaroni represents the perfect fusion of two beloved Pakistani flavors. This unique combination brings together the tangy, spicy notes of achari with the rich, savory taste of traditional qeema spices. Our expertly crafted blend includes pickle spices, meat seasonings, and aromatic herbs that create a complex and satisfying flavor profile. Each bite delivers layers of taste that unfold gradually, making this macaroni a truly special culinary experience. Made with premium durum wheat and a carefully balanced spice mix, this product offers restaurant-quality fusion cuisine at home.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Mix with achari qeema spice packet
Add cooked ground meat for authenticity
Garnish with fresh herbs and serve hot

11.name: Golden Chicken Chowmein Spaghetti 250g
11.description: Enjoy the delicious fusion of Golden Chicken Chowmein Spaghetti! This unique blend brings the beloved flavors of Chinese chowmein to Italian spaghetti, creating an exciting cross-cultural culinary experience.
11.longDescription: Golden Chicken Chowmein Spaghetti offers an innovative fusion that combines the best of Chinese and Italian cuisines. Our special chowmein spice blend captures the authentic flavors of traditional Chinese stir-fry with soy sauce, ginger, garlic, and aromatic vegetables. The long, thin spaghetti strands are perfect for holding the savory sauce, creating a dish that's both familiar and excitingly different. Made with premium durum wheat and enhanced with traditional Chinese seasonings, this spaghetti brings the bustling flavors of Chinese street food to your home kitchen.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Drain and rinse with cold water
Stir-fry with chowmein spice packet
Add vegetables and chicken strips
Serve hot with soy sauce on the side

12.name: Golden Tikka Spaghetti 250g
12.description: Savor the rich and smoky flavors of Golden Tikka Spaghetti! This premium spaghetti brings the beloved taste of tikka barbecue to long pasta strands, creating a unique and satisfying meal experience.
12.longDescription: Golden Tikka Spaghetti transforms the classic tikka experience by pairing it with elegant spaghetti strands. Our signature tikka spice blend features smoky paprika, aromatic cumin, and traditional barbecue seasonings that coat each strand beautifully. The long pasta format allows for better sauce distribution and creates an impressive presentation that's perfect for both casual meals and special occasions. Made with premium durum wheat and enhanced with authentic tikka spices, this spaghetti offers a sophisticated twist on traditional Pakistani flavors.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Drain and reserve 1/2 cup pasta water
Toss with tikka spice packet and pasta water
Add grilled chicken or vegetables
Serve hot with fresh herbs

13.name: Golden 7 Spice Spaghetti 250g
13.description: Discover the sophisticated flavors of Golden 7 Spice Spaghetti! This gourmet blend combines seven premium spices to create a complex and aromatic pasta experience that's both exotic and comforting.
13.longDescription: Golden 7 Spice Spaghetti elevates your pasta experience with our signature blend of seven carefully selected spices. This sophisticated combination creates layers of flavor that unfold with each bite, offering warm notes of cinnamon and allspice balanced with aromatic herbs and a gentle heat. The long spaghetti strands are perfect for showcasing this complex spice blend, allowing each flavor to shine while creating a harmonious overall taste. Made with premium durum wheat and our proprietary spice mix, this spaghetti offers a gourmet dining experience that's perfect for food enthusiasts.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Drain and reserve pasta water
Toss with 7 spice blend gradually
Add pasta water to achieve desired consistency
Let flavors meld for 2-3 minutes before serving

14.name: Golden Fajita Spaghetti 250g
14.description: Experience the vibrant flavors of Golden Fajita Spaghetti! This exciting fusion brings Mexican-inspired fajita spices to elegant spaghetti strands, creating a colorful and flavorful meal.
14.longDescription: Golden Fajita Spaghetti combines the festive spirit of Mexican cuisine with the elegance of Italian pasta. Our authentic fajita spice blend features bell peppers, onions, lime, and traditional Mexican seasonings that create a vibrant and exciting flavor profile. The long spaghetti strands beautifully showcase the colorful spices and create an impressive presentation that's perfect for entertaining. Made with premium durum wheat and enhanced with natural vegetable powders, this spaghetti brings the lively atmosphere of Mexican cuisine to your dining table.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Drain and reserve pasta water
Toss with fajita spice packet
Add saut√©ed bell peppers and onions
Garnish with fresh cilantro and lime wedges

15.name: Golden Achari Spaghetti 250g
15.description: Enjoy the tangy and spicy flavors of Golden Achari Spaghetti! This unique fusion brings the beloved taste of Pakistani pickles to elegant spaghetti strands, creating an unforgettable culinary experience.
15.longDescription: Golden Achari Spaghetti offers a sophisticated take on traditional Pakistani pickle flavors. Our authentic achari spice blend features mustard seeds, fennel, fenugreek, and other traditional pickle spices that create the perfect balance of tanginess and heat. The long spaghetti format allows these complex flavors to coat each strand beautifully, creating an elegant presentation that's perfect for both casual dining and special occasions. Made with premium durum wheat and traditional pickle spices, this spaghetti brings the nostalgic flavors of homemade pickles to your pasta bowl.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Drain and reserve pasta water
Toss with achari spice packet
Add a splash of pasta water for consistency
Serve hot with pickled vegetables on the side

16.name: Golden Chat Masala 45g
16.description: Enhance your snacks and meals with Golden Chat Masala! This authentic blend of tangy and spicy spices adds the perfect finishing touch to fruits, snacks, and street food favorites.
16.longDescription: Golden Chat Masala is the essential seasoning that brings the authentic taste of Pakistani street food to your kitchen. This carefully crafted blend combines black salt, dried mango powder, cumin, coriander, and other traditional spices to create the perfect balance of tangy, spicy, and savory flavors. Whether you're sprinkling it on fresh fruits, adding it to chaat items, or using it to enhance your favorite snacks, this masala delivers that distinctive street food taste that's both nostalgic and irresistible. Made with premium quality spices and traditional recipes, Golden Chat Masala is a must-have condiment for every kitchen.
cookingInstructions: Sprinkle on fresh fruits like apples, guavas, or oranges
Add to chaat items like bhel puri or pani puri
Mix with yogurt for a tangy dip
Sprinkle on roasted nuts or snacks
Add to salads for extra flavor
Use as a finishing spice on any dish

17.name: Golden U-Shape Vermicelli 100g
17.description: Discover the versatility of Golden U-Shape Vermicelli! This finely crafted vermicelli is perfect for both savory and sweet dishes, offering a delightful texture that enhances your favorite recipes.
17.longDescription: Golden U-Shape Vermicelli offers incredible versatility in a convenient 100g pack. This premium vermicelli is crafted with the finest wheat flour and shaped into unique U-curves that cook evenly and hold flavors beautifully. Whether you're preparing traditional seviyan kheer for dessert, savory upma for breakfast, or innovative fusion dishes, this vermicelli adapts perfectly to any recipe. The unique U-shape design ensures better texture and sauce absorption, making every dish more flavorful and satisfying. Made with high-quality ingredients and processed under strict hygiene standards, this vermicelli is perfect for health-conscious families who don't want to compromise on taste.
cookingInstructions: For savory dishes: Roast vermicelli in a pan until golden
Add hot water or broth (1:2 ratio)
Cook for 3-4 minutes until tender
For sweet dishes: Roast with ghee until golden
Add milk and sugar, cook until creamy
Garnish with nuts and serve

18.name: Golden U-Shape Vermicelli 130g
18.description: Golden U-Shape Vermicelli 130g - Perfect family size pack for all your cooking needs. Ideal for both sweet and savory preparations with premium quality and taste.
18.longDescription: Golden U-Shape Vermicelli 130g offers the perfect family-sized portion for all your culinary adventures. This premium vermicelli maintains the same exceptional quality as our smaller pack but provides more quantity for larger families or multiple servings. The unique U-shape design ensures even cooking and better sauce absorption, making every dish more flavorful and satisfying. Whether you're preparing traditional seviyan kheer for special occasions, savory upma for breakfast, or innovative fusion dishes, this vermicelli adapts beautifully to any recipe. Made from the finest wheat flour and processed under strict quality controls, each strand delivers consistent texture and taste.
cookingInstructions: For savory dishes: Roast vermicelli in a pan until golden
Add hot water or broth (1:2 ratio)
Cook for 3-4 minutes until tender
For sweet dishes: Roast with ghee until golden
Add milk and sugar, cook until creamy
Garnish with nuts and serve

19.name: Golden Spaghetti 400g
19.description: Enjoy the authentic taste of Golden Classic Spaghetti 400g! This premium pasta is made from the finest durum wheat, offering the perfect texture and taste for all your favorite Italian dishes.
19.longDescription: Golden Classic Spaghetti 400g brings authentic Italian pasta experience to your home kitchen. Made from 100% premium durum wheat semolina, this spaghetti offers the perfect al dente texture that Italian cuisine is famous for. Each strand is carefully crafted to hold sauces beautifully, whether you're preparing a simple aglio e olio, rich bolognese, or creamy carbonara. The 400g family pack is perfect for multiple servings and ensures you always have quality pasta on hand. Our classic spaghetti maintains its shape and texture even after cooking, providing restaurant-quality results every time.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking
Test for desired doneness (al dente recommended)
Drain and serve immediately with your favorite sauce
Reserve pasta water for sauce consistency if needed

20.name: Golden Spaghetti 450g
20.description: Experience premium quality with Golden Classic Spaghetti 450g! This larger pack offers exceptional value while maintaining the authentic Italian taste and perfect texture you love.
20.longDescription: Golden Classic Spaghetti 450g provides excellent value for larger families or pasta enthusiasts who appreciate quality. This premium spaghetti is crafted from the finest durum wheat semolina, ensuring consistent quality and authentic Italian taste in every strand. The larger 450g pack is perfect for meal planning, entertaining, or simply ensuring you never run out of quality pasta. Each strand cooks to perfect al dente texture, providing the ideal foundation for any sauce or preparation. Whether you're hosting a dinner party or preparing weekly family meals, this spaghetti delivers restaurant-quality results consistently.
cookingInstructions: Boil 5-6 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking
Test for desired doneness (al dente recommended)
Drain and serve immediately with your favorite sauce
Reserve pasta water for sauce consistency if needed

21.name: Golden Spaghetti premium 500g
21.description: Get the best value with Golden Classic Spaghetti 500g! This bulk pack offers premium Italian-style pasta perfect for large families, restaurants, or pasta lovers who demand quality.
21.longDescription: Golden Classic Spaghetti 500g represents the ultimate value in premium pasta. This generous bulk pack is perfect for large families, small restaurants, or anyone who appreciates having quality pasta readily available. Made from 100% premium durum wheat semolina, this spaghetti maintains the same exceptional quality and authentic Italian taste as our smaller packs. The 500g size offers significant savings while ensuring you never compromise on quality. Each strand is carefully crafted to deliver perfect texture and superior sauce-holding capability, making every meal a delightful experience.
cookingInstructions: Boil 6-7 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add spaghetti and cook for 10-12 minutes
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking
Test for desired doneness (al dente recommended)
Drain and serve immediately with your favorite sauce
Reserve pasta water for sauce consistency if needed

22.name: Golden Small Elbow Macaroni 400g
22.description: Enjoy the classic taste of Golden Small Elbow Macaroni 400g! This traditional pasta shape is perfect for mac and cheese, pasta salads, and countless other delicious recipes.
22.longDescription: Golden Small Elbow Macaroni 400g brings the beloved classic pasta shape to your kitchen in a generous family-sized pack. These perfectly curved elbow pieces are ideal for holding cheese sauces, making them the go-to choice for mac and cheese, pasta salads, and casseroles. Made from premium durum wheat semolina, each piece maintains its shape and texture even after cooking, ensuring your dishes look as good as they taste. The small size makes them perfect for children and creates an appealing presentation in any dish. This versatile pasta shape is a pantry essential that works beautifully in both hot and cold preparations.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add elbow macaroni and cook for 8-10 minutes
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking
Test for desired doneness
Drain and use immediately in your recipe
Perfect for mac and cheese or pasta salads

23.name: Golden Macaroni Box 400g
23.description: Experience the authentic taste of Golden Macaroni Box 400g! This classic tube-shaped pasta is perfect for baked dishes, hearty sauces, and traditional Italian recipes.
23.longDescription: Golden Macaroni Box 400g features the traditional tube-shaped pasta that has been a family favorite for generations. The hollow center and smooth exterior make it perfect for capturing and holding thick sauces, cheese, and other ingredients. This versatile pasta shape is ideal for baked macaroni dishes, casseroles, and hearty pasta salads. Made from premium durum wheat semolina, each piece cooks evenly and maintains its structure, ensuring perfect results every time. The generous 400g size is perfect for family meals and entertaining guests.
cookingInstructions: Boil 4-5 cups of water with 1 tsp salt
Add macaroni and cook for 10-12 minutes
Stir occasionally to prevent sticking
Test for desired doneness
Drain and use in your favorite recipe
Excellent for baked dishes and casseroles
